title: Choice of Brand for Crackers
reference: Jain, Dipak C.,  Naufel J.    Vilcassim and  Pradeep K.  Chintagunta (1994) “A random–coefficients logit brand–choice model applied to panel data”, Journal of Business and Economics Statistics, 12(3), 317.
